page.title: 03Industry in Bognor Regis (1)
page.content: Most industry in Bognor is of the light, manufacturing variety.{ {Shripney Rd. Industrial Estate LEC (Longford Manufacturing Co.) Make fridges and freezers. Employ 2000 HAGO Make plastic coated wire products. John Wiley bookbinders and publishers 3P Packing Paper Suppliers Sangamo Make transducers and calibration instruments Employ 150 {Ash Grove Industrial Park Kedex Sheet Metal products Employ 10 Tonan Make Pneumatic Instruments Employ 4 Chillguard Fit Double glazing Employ 4 AGF Home Computer Experts Employ 4
